data.name: ISLAND Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is a collection of BGM tracks from the game ISLAND.
The DLC contains the music in both WAV and MP3 format.


1.Traveler's Tale
2.In The Cycle Of Seasons
3.Summer Sunlight
4.A Walk Along The Shore
5.Shaded By Leaves
6.Even If Tomorrow Comes
7.Endless Starry Sky
8.Hazy Heat
9.Water Balloons
10.For Always
11.Setsuna's Theme
12.Groan-Inducing Gags
13.Evening Calm
14.Dissonance
15.If There Truly Is A God
16.Empty Words
17.The Unfortunate Truth
18.Power Out Of Pain
19.Scream Into Nothingness
20.My Feelings, My Mission
21.Rising Light
22.Falling Drops
23.At Journey's End
24.Scornful Gazes
25.Silent Gears
26.A Charcoal Sky
27.Peaceful Moments
28.Do Not Interfere
29.Malice Draws Near
30.Justice Through Power
31.Sparks of Revolution
32.Your Cold Hands On My Face
33.The Warmth Of Human Touch
34.Not All Wishes Come True
35.The Light in These Hands
36.Traveler's Tale (Piano Arrangement)
37.Traveler's Tale (Instrumental)
38.Present
39.Present (Piano Arrangement)
40.Present (Present)
41.You Were There
42.You Were There (Piano Arrangement)
43.You Were There (Instrumental)


Note: This soundtrack is sold as DLC, and thus the files will be downloaded to the folder in which the game is installed.
You can check the installation location of the game by right-clicking the game in the Library section of the Steam client and select Properties, followed by clicking "Browse Local Files..." on the "Local Files" tab.


WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8.1/10
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
